changes:
* Fixed: Session cookies set in iOS tab views don't last for the lifetime of the app
* Fixed: Android trims first and last tokens of objects returned from `modal.executeJS()`
* Improved coloring for tinted, opaque tabs on iOS.
description:
APIs to deal with opening browser tabs and external sites within your app.

The tabs module allows you to open external sites in an un-trusted popup view that your users can close at any point.
